page.title: 11At Work.
page.content: The{largest employer}in our area is Shulton's. They manufacture after shave lotions and perfumes and are famous for 'Old Spice'. We visited the factory and were given a guided tour. They employ about 300 people, 200 women and 100 men. Shulton's have been in Seaton Delaval for 20 years. The firm began in New York in 1934. About 10 people work in the canteen and when we went for our visit we were given orange juice and biscuits there as well as many samples of their products. The factory works a{main shift}from 8 am to 4.30 pm except on Fridays when they finish at 12 noon. We saw the{packing line}in operation and we were told that the three lines each cost approx. Â£250 000! The trip was very interesting and enjoyable.
